name: Erasmus Singh: The DEEPHUNTER
description:
What hidden mystery lies at the very bottom of the uncharted ocean?! 

Famed underwater explorer and professional treasure hunter Captain Erasmus Singh is on the most dangerous mission of his storied career.

Erasmus has discovered a heretofore unknown section of the ocean depths that may very well hide the most exciting discovery in the history of mankind.

But what is this??? MINES! BARRIERS! TRAPS!

Someone HAS been here before! But who? And why? Are they trying to protect their ancient vast treasure? Or is it something else...

INSTRUCTIONS: 

Erasmus Singh: The Deephunter is a retro-style submarine diving exploration game where you pilot a submarine DEEPER AND DEEPER.

- Pilot the sub using the WASD or ARROWS, keys or the control icons in the UI

- Fire off depth charges to destroy mines

- Use your electro shock wave ability to save yourself in the stickiest of situations

- Collect fuel to continue your journey and coins to increase your score

True success can only be found when you reach THE BOTTOM OF THE DARKEST DEPTHS. Help Captain Erasmus Singh journey into LEGEND!
